thread.title: Helen Togher
thread.title_full: Elara Online reviewed by Helen Togher

author: Helen Togher
title: Helen Togher
text: Everything was as ordered. Only thing was informed that package would be delivered Monday but it arrived earlier on the Friday. This was ok as I was home but could have been an issue. I had arranged for someone tho be there on the Monday. I would definitely purchase from you again and have no hesitation in recommending you
